io.spine.server.entity

Class EventDispatchingRepository<I,E extends AbstractEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
        • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
          • io.spine.server.entity.EventDispatchingRepository<I,E,S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<I>>, MulticastDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,I>, EventDispatcher<I>, ExternalDispatcherFactory<I>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProcessManagerRepository, ProjectionRepository

    public abstract class EventDispatchingRepository<I,E extends AbstractEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
implements EventDispatcher<I>
    Abstract base for repositories that deliver events to entities they manage.

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  EventDispatchingRepository.AbstractExternalEventDispatcher
      An abstract base for the external message dispatchers, enabling the EventDispatchingRepository instances to handle external events.

      • registerWith

        @OverridingMethodsMustInvokeSuper
public void registerWith(BoundedContext context)
        Registers itself as an event dispatcher with the parent BoundedContext.
        Overrides:
        registerWith in class DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E extends AbstractEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
        Parameters:
        context - the BoundedContext of this repository

      • setupEventRouting

        protected void setupEventRouting(EventRouting<I> routing)
        A callback for derived repository classes to customize routing schema for events.

        Default routing returns the ID of the entity which produced the event. This allows to “link” different kinds of entities by having the same class of IDs. More complex scenarios (e.g. one-to-many relationships) may require custom routing schemas.

        Parameters:
        routing - the routing schema to customize

      • dispatch

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public final void dispatch(EventEnvelope event)
        Dispatches the event to the corresponding entities.

        If there is no stored entity with such an ID, a new one is created and stored after it handles the passed event.

        Specified by:
        dispatch in interface MessageDispatcher<EventClass,EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<I>>
        Parameters:
        event - the event to dispatch

      • dispatchTo

        protected abstract void dispatchTo(I id,
                                   io.spine.core.Event event)
        Dispatches the given event to an entity with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the target entity ID
        event - the event to dispatch
